[{'comment_id': 1259421728, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
            try:
                idp_enabled = json.loads(r.text)["IDP_ENABLED"]
            except (json.decoder.JSONDecodeError, KeyError):
                idp_enabled = false
```

The current version would crash if we were using this against an older version of mscolab, since it does not return well-formed json and/or the IDP_ENABLED key would not be present. This should also be moved further down, into the branch checking `r.status_code == 200`, since we can only expect the json response in the case of a successful request.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 7, 11, 8, 49, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'matrss', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1263570812, 'comment_body': 'Since this is handling the "happy-path", i.e. a successful request to the `/status` endpoint, this should be further down in the if-branch checking `r.status_code == 200`.
